Title: Kung Din
Description:
I hope you are capable of this next task, for our lives depend on it.

There is only one key that will unlock our chains. Unfortunately, the key hangs around the neck of the hozen's pet tiger, Kung Din.

They keep the tiger in the great pit to the north. The only way to retrieve the key will be to kill the beast.
ObjectivesText: Obtain the Slingtail Key by slaying Kung Din.
PortraitGiverText: The great beast holds the key.
RewardText:
Yes, with this key I will be able to free our chains.

You have delivered us from this vile place.
